remarks: The inverse of the group operation reverses the arguments.  Lemma 2.2.1(d) of [Herstein] p. 55.  (Contributed by NM, 27-Oct-2006.)
statement:
grpinvadd.b $e |- B = ( Base ` G ) $.
grpinvadd.p $e |- .+ = ( +g ` G ) $.
grpinvadd.n $e |- N = ( invg ` G ) $.
grpinvadd $p |- ( ( G e. Grp /\ X e. B /\ Y e. B ) -> ( N ` ( X .+ Y ) ) = ( ( N ` Y ) .+ ( N ` X ) ) ) $.
